attributes.action: Require local government authorities to introduce E-petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is,in my opinion,a lack of involvement and "democracy" in local government.A step in the right direction would be to encourage citizens to publicise and communicate their views/concerns to the local authority,thereby involving them in local affairs.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
